item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (340 points | 217 comments)
2. Egoless Engineering (381 points | 137 comments)
3. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (352 points | 524 comments)
4. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (101 points | 15 comments)
5. A Particle Physics Course for High-School Students (5 points | discuss)
6. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (199 points | 64 comments)
7. The Tube Computer (141 points | 45 comments)
8. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir with Membran (6 points | discuss)
9. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (65 points | 12 comments)
10. EmacsConf 2024 (7 points | discuss)
11. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (45 points | 13 comments)
12. Show HN: My C compiler compiled itself (86 points | 27 comments)
13. Phoenix LiveView 1.0.0 is here (295 points | 52 comments)
14. Formaldehyde Causes More Cancer Than Any Other Toxic Air Pollutant (27 points | 18 comments)
15. Rust library for building no-boilerplate CLI apps (22 points | 4 comments)
16. Dependency management fatigue, or why I ditched React for Go+HTMX+Templ (191 points | 184 comments)
17. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (116 points | 147 comments)
18. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (39 points | 8 comments)
19. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
20. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (127 points | 114 comments)
21. Homography Explained with Code (15 points | 2 comments)
22. My brand new digitizing workflow using a 25 year old film scanner (84 points | 43 comments)
23. Show HN: Book and change flights with one email (60 points | 21 comments)
24. A new home for Python-build-standalone (31 points | 10 comments)
25. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (59 points | 23 comments)
26. Information Batteries (2021) [pdf] (16 points | 2 comments)
27. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D engine (177 points | 39 comments)
28. Amazon Nova (289 points | 114 comments)
29. Gratitude Despite the Odds (3 points | discuss)
30. Automated reasoning to remove LLM hallucinations (32 points | 25 comments)
